name: EXTREMELY 3D GAME
description:
You're just casually walking around in the middle of the night. Well, you planned to go shopping, but lost your car keys.

Controls:

normal 3D game walking keys (wasd)

mouse to look around, left mouse button to interact

MINIMUM SCREEN HEIGHT FOR THE GAME MUST BE AT LEAST 725 PIXELS OR YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO FINISH THE GAME.

The game should open on any OS if it has JRE (if you can open Minecraft or Runescape, you can open this game).

If you would like to donate Bitcoin, here's my Bitcoin address: 1diUgZyj4YWwEegqCJjFWuQDg3Kf1XV21

Please post links of your gameplay in the comments!
